casebody.data:
SUTHERLAND v. TROY & B. R. CO. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. March 1, 1894.) Action by Rebecca Sutherland against the Troy & Boston Railroad Company.

Argued before MAYHAM, P. X, and HERRICK and PUTNAM, JX

No opinion. Motion for reargument denied, with $10 costs. See 26 N. Y. Supp. 237.
